sentences.sContent: A: Yeah.But it’s easy to get lost in the forest and compass is useless there.
sentences.sCn: 是的。 但那里的森林很容易迷路，而且指南针在那儿派不上用场。

sentences.sContent: Of course, most men have no interest in being there and that is why they get lost in the aisles.
sentences.sCn: 当然了，大多数男人还是对在超市不感兴趣的，这也是为什么他们在过道都会迷路的原因。

sentences.sContent: It might seem impossible to get lost in the modern world with its ubiquity of digital maps, but there is more than one way to be lost.
sentences.sCn: 在这个到处都有电子地图的现代世界，迷路恐怕不太可能发生了，但我们还是有不只一种会导致迷失的方法。
